summary: Congress required the Department of Homeland Security to submit to a plan for improving border security, including how DHS intended to use personnel, barriers, and technology. DHS was required to include 11 elements in the plan, such as goals and objectives for security investments and a detailed implementation schedule. DHS's Border Security Improvement Plan for FY 2019-2020 was late and provided incomplete information. For example...
title: Border Security: Assessment of the Department of Homeland Security's Border Security Improvement Plan
